org.xbib.marc.xml

Class MarcContentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.marc.xml.MarcContentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarcListener, MarcRecordListener, MarcXchangeConstants, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MabXMLContentHandler, MarcJsonWriter, MarcWriter, MarcXchangeWriter, PicaXMLContentHandler

    public class MarcContentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements MarcXchangeConstants, MarcListener, MarcRecordListener, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    The Sax-ContentHandler-based MarcXchange handler can handle incoming SaX events and fires events to a Marc listener.
